inspector.referenceMaterial.tooltip: Settings will be copied from the material specified here.
inspector.ignoreMaterials.tooltip: The settings of the material set here will not be copied.
inspector.properties.tooltip: The properties entered here will be copied.
inspector.parentOverride.tooltip: The menu will be placed in the folder specified here. If nothing is specified, the menu will be placed in the parent MenuFolder component if it exists, or in the root if not.
inspector.menuName.tooltip: This is the name of the menu displayed on VRChat.
inspector.objects.tooltip: The object specified here will be turned on or off when the menu is activated.
inspector.blendShapeModifiers.tooltip: The BlendShape specified here will be set to the specified value when the menu is activated.
inspector.name: Name
inspector.materialReplacers.tooltip: Materials of the mesh specified here will be set to the specified material when the menu is enabled.
inspector.materialPropertyModifiers.tool: ここに指定したマテリアルのプロパティはメニューを有効化したときに指定した値にセットされます。
inspector.isSave.tooltip: If you turn this on, the state will be saved even if the avatar is loaded.
inspector.isLocalOnly.tooltip: If you turn this on, objects will only be turned on and off from your perspective.
dialog.error.processfailed: Avatar build was canceled because an error occurred during processing.
